a.title: Staff Directory
a.style: transition:background-color 250ms linear; font-size: 13.33px; display: inline !important; background-color: rgb(30, 95, 11);

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: latobold; font-size: 18px;

br.span: If you are a parent of a Northern Adirondack CSD student, please
fill out this brief survey by clicking on the link below. Although an email address is required, your opinions will not be shared.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: latobold; font-size: 18px;

br.span:
This survey will be open until 12 noon, Monday, 4/27/20.
https://forms.gle/tQ97SAPAqxw3HT7a6

p.style: letter-spacing: normal; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252); text-align: center;

span.style: font-weight: 700; box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 12pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span:
AMID ONGOING COVID-19 PANDEMIC, GOVERNOR CUOMO DIRECTS
FLAGS TO BE FLOWN AT

span.style: font-weight: 700; box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 12pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span:
HALF-MAST
IN HONOR OF THOSE WE HAVE LOST TO COVID-19

p.style: letter-spacing: normal; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252); text-align: center;

span.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
span.span: Flags Will Remain Lowered While New York is on PAUSE

p.span: I am very excited to be at Northern Adirondack Central for the 2019 – 2020 school year, my first as your Superintendent. It is my pleasure to work with you in the pursuit of greatness for our students and the entire school community.

The 2019 – 2020 school year will be exciting for all, with some new staff members and the continued advancement of technology. We must continue to work together to pursue high levels of academic excellence, and strive to be one of the best districts in Clinton County and the entire North country. This is only possible with the continued efforts of our dedicated Board of Education, our positive leadership from our Administrators and their support staff, as well as the committed teachers and other staff who support and challenge our students on a daily basis.
I am looking forward to experiencing the collective teamwork and sense of community that encourages the

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

p.span: motto which promotes great progress and opportunities for our students.
Education is the primary foundation for everything.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";
